mapper.insert: insert into user_result (user_id,quiz_id,choices,attempt_times,score,reflection,reflection_time,reflection_available, supervisor_id) values (#{userId}, #{quizId}, #{choices, jdbcType=VARCHAR, typeHandler=com.berryst.demo.utils.StringToIntArrayHandler}, #{numberOfAttempt}, #{score}, #{reflection}, sysdate(),#{reflectionAvailable}, #{supervisorId})
mapper.select: select attempt_id, user_result.quiz_id, quiz.quiz_title, reflection_time, user_result.user_id, username, reflection_available from user_result left join quiz on user_result.quiz_id=quiz.quiz_id left join user on user_result.user_id = user.user_id where user_result.user_id = #{userId} order by reflection_time desc

select attempt_id, user_result.quiz_id, quiz.quiz_title, reflection_time, user_result.user_id, username, reflection_available from user_result left join quiz on user_result.quiz_id=quiz.quiz_id left join user on user_result.user_id = user.user_id where user_result.supervisor_id = #{userId} order by reflection_time desc
select * from user_result where attempt_id = #{attemptId} order by reflection_time desc
select * from user_result where user_id = #{userId} and quiz_id = #{quizId} order by attempt_times desc limit 1
select comment, comment_time from comment order by comment_time desc
select feedback_content from feedback where quiz_id = #{quizId} and lower_bound <= #{score} and upper_bound >= #{score}
